simple.escp.data

Interface DataSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BeanDataSource, EmptyDataSource, JsonDataSource, MapDataSource

    public interface DataSource
    A DataSource is used to supply value when filling a Report.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object get(java.lang.String member)
      Retrieve value for a member from this DataSource.
      java.lang.String[] getMembers()
      Retrieve all member of this DataSource.
      java.lang.Object getSource()
      Retrieve the source value of this DataSource.
      boolean has(java.lang.String member)
      Check if this DataSource contains certain member name.

    • Method Detail

      • has

        boolean has(java.lang.String member)
        Check if this DataSource contains certain member name.
        Parameters:
        member - the member that will be verified.
        Returns:
        true if this DataSource contains member.

      • get

        java.lang.Object get(java.lang.String member)
                     throws InvalidPlaceholder
        Retrieve value for a member from this DataSource.
        Parameters:
        member - the member that will be retrieved. This DataSource must have the specified member.
        Returns:
        an object that represent the member value.
        Throws:
        InvalidPlaceholder - if member doesn't exists or can't retrieve the member value.

      • getSource

        java.lang.Object getSource()
        Retrieve the source value of this DataSource.
        Returns:
        source value of this DataSource.

      • getMembers

        java.lang.String[] getMembers()
        Retrieve all member of this DataSource.
        Returns:
        all member of this DataSource or empty array if no member is available.
